dict.string:
require_cmd "${TM_SVN:=svn}" "If you have installed svn, then you need to either update your <tt>PATH</tt> or set the <tt>TM_SVN</tt> shell variable (e.g. in Preferences / Advanced)"
: ${TM_RUBY:=ruby} FORMAT_INFO="${TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT}/format_info.rb"
if [[ -z $TM_SELECTED_FILES ]]; then "$TM_SVN" info "$TM_FILEPATH" 2>&1 \ |"$TM_RUBY" -- "$FORMAT_INFO" else eval "$TM_SVN" info "$TM_SELECTED_FILES" 2>&1 \ |"$TM_RUBY" -- "$FORMAT_INFO" fi
